title: Welcome to react using react-i18next OLL DESIGN

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.

gallery_groups.badge_hover: グラフィックデザイン

desc.address: ▼Store Production (Domestic & International)|Store design and supervision|Store planning and production|Property introduction, investigation, and sales forecasting|Store renovations and new business development|Consulting for overseas store openings|Production and sales of imported overseas goods (furniture, fixtures, kitchen equipment, etc.)||▼Graphic Design|Logo and web design|Print design (flyers, business cards, menus, etc.) to printing||▼Original Goods Planning, Creation, and Sales|Amusement prizes|Apparel, stationery, miscellaneous goods
Shanghai Onishi Group Architectural Design Consulting Co., Ltd.|No. 2 Warehouse, 1098 Jiangyang South Road, Baoshan District, Shanghai

desc.business: 出店プロデュース（国内・海外対応）

sub_business.name: 店舗企画・店舗設計・設計監理
物件紹介・売上げ予測
店舗改装・新業態開発
国内・海外出店コンサルティング
海外輸入品制作・販売（家具・什器・厨房等

desc.business: グラフィックデザイン

sub_business.name: 紙面デザイン（チラシ・名刺・メニュー等）～印刷
ウェブデザイン・ホームページ作成

desc.business: イベント企画・イベントプロデュース

sub_business.name: 音響設備レンタル・音響スタッフ派遣
オリジナルグッズ作成・販売（Tシャツ・ユニフォ−ム等）

business.header: We build stores that sell.|||It's our mission.
business.desc: OLLDESIGN is a store design company.|||Utilizing chain store theories studied in the United States, we aim to create successful stores across various business types. Once a client secures a property, we develop the blueprints and design, supporting the process up to the store's opening.||||||We also offer marketing consulting, handling operations when customers visit the store. For example, we discuss specifics like the ideal product delivery speed and layout when serving multiple customers. Our detailed consulting approach means projects typically take six months to a year to complete.||||||Rather than focusing solely on aesthetic design, our priority is creating stores that consistently generate sales. We strive to build efficient stores that delight customers

business.header: Design based on numerical evidence from IE (industrial engineering)
business.desc: A scientific method that quantifies every problem and event, logically improving and reforming them.||||||Believing that competitors are not limited to domestic ones, we conduct store comparisons worldwide. Through this process, we have developed unique expertise, information, and knowledge that make us strong in chain stores.

business.header: Strategic design tailored to store objectives and conditions
business.desc: We propose a comprehensive review and standardization of your store opening process to maximize cost savings and profitability. Our approach goes beyond just reducing opening costs. We focus on shortening construction timelines (boosting sales by opening sooner), optimizing workflow plans (reducing labor costs), and creating highly appealing and strategically located store designs (increasing customer traffic).
select_2: Extensive expertise in chain store design.
Store openings in Japan and overseas, with consulting in Asia.

homepage.title: Graphic design office of a design company.

homepage.QHeader: Won't you do just the graphics?
homepage.QDesc: It is often thought to be a business only associated with design work, and we frequently receive this question from our customers||| The answer is, of course, 'Yes, gladly.'||| This is the reason we launched a dedicated page for our graphic design business.

homepage.head: Graphic design that knows the store inside and out
homepage.desc: Success of a store is influenced not only by the space but also by its visual impression.||| We provide graphic design that is optimal for the store's characteristics and target audience, maximizing the store's brand value.||| We ensure consistency in all designs, such as logos, signs, posters, and menus, to strengthen the brand image.||| We create attractive and memorable designs that make customers naturally want to visit.||| We know the 'designs' required for a store and propose visuals that truly resonate with customers. Sophisticated designs lead to increased sales and enhanced brand recognition.||| With designs that highlight your store's individuality, let's take the lead in a competitive market.

homepage.ideaTitle: What our graphic business can do

homepage.ideaHeader: As long as you have an idea, you can create anything.

childrenDetail.title: Branding
childrenDetail.desc: □ Want to make my store *look more attractive*, but how should I do it?|||□ Want to *create a brand*, but where should I start?|||□ Want customers to remember my store more and *make a strong impression*|||□ Want to *stand out from other stores* and be noticeable|||□ Want to create a *beloved brand* for customers|||□ *Can't unify the brand image*... I want to fix that!|||□ Want to create a brand that gets *noticed on social media and advertising*|||□ Want to *strengthen the bond with customers* through brand creation|||□ Want to *increase sales* by enhancing the brand power|||□ Want to create a brand that resonates not just visually, but *emotionally*

childrenDetail.title: Sign Design
childrenDetail.desc: □ Want to *make my store stand out more*, but what kind of sign is effective?|||□ Want to *catch the eye of passersby*!|||□ Want a sign that *expresses the store's personality*, but how should I choose it?|||□ For a new store, *how can I get noticed first*?|||□ Want to convey *comfort* with a sign that matches the store's atmosphere|||□ Want to guide customers *clearly and smoothly* to the store|||□ Want a sign that *stands out* even at night|||□ Want a *simple and memorable sign* that stays in customers' minds|||□ Want a sign that makes the store *look even more attractive* according to its location|||□ The sign is getting old, but I want to *renew it and make it fresh!*

childrenDetail.title: Website Development
childrenDetail.desc: □ Want to convey more attraction, need an *effective website*|||□ Want a new site to get *more customers to know about the store*|||□ Want to create a site that is *easy to view on smartphones*|||□ Want a site that *easily introduces the store online*|||□ Want to create an *original LP site*|||□ Want to create an effective website to *increase customer attraction*|||□ Don't know which design *fits my store the best*|||□ Want to focus not only on appearance but also on *ease of use*|||□ Want a website with *solid SEO measures*|||□ After the site is created, want *support for updates and management*

childrenDetail.title: Advertising & Promotional Design
childrenDetail.desc: □ Want a *more eye-catching and effective design*|||□ Want to *increase sales* with promotional materials that resonate with customers|||□ Want to *get attention* for new products or services|||□ Want an advertisement design that perfectly matches the target to *get a response*|||□ Want to highlight store campaigns and *increase foot traffic*|||□ Want to create designs that are *easily shareable on social media*|||□ Want a *simple and memorable ad design* that stays in people's minds|||□ Want to think about *seasonal promotional designs*|||□ Want to increase *brand awareness* with promotional materials|||□ Want to *effectively promote the store* with flyers and posters

childrenDetail.title: Photography & Video Production
childrenDetail.desc: □ Want *photos and videos that bring out the store's charm* to the fullest|||□ Need *professional photos* to get *noticed on social media and websites*!|||□ Want to create *videos that convey the charm* of products and services|||□ Want to produce *videos of events or campaigns*|||□ Want to *capture the hearts of customers* with powerful photos that appeal visually|||□ Want to enhance the impression with *beautiful photos* that convey the store's atmosphere|||□ Want *professional photos and videos* for advertising|||□ Want to *explain products clearly* with videos|||□ Want to convey the *brand story* with videos and *evoke emotions*|||□ Want to *stand out from other stores* with high-quality photos and videos

childrenDetail.title: Original Goods
childrenDetail.desc: □ Want to *spread the brand* more with the store's original goods|||□ Want goods perfect for *events and campaigns*|||□ Want to create *unique and attractive goods* that customers will love|||□ Want goods with the company logo or message to *increase recognition*|||□ Want to create goods that *convey the store's charm* and increase fans|||□ Want to create *commemorative items and promotional goods* that leave an impression on customers|||□ Want to create *original goods for pets*|||□ Want to create goods that *strengthen branding* and match the store's atmosphere|||□ Want goods for events that will *leave a lasting memory with customers*|||□ Want to create *special designs* for *memorable* goods
